columns.name: SUMMONS_KEY
columns.description: Randomly generated persistent ID for each violation

columns.name: SUMMONS_DATE
columns.description: Exact date of violation for the reported event

columns.name: OFFENSE_DESCRIPTION
columns.description: Description of the violation committed

columns.name: LAW_SECTION_NUMBER
columns.description: NYS Penal Law and local law section number

columns.name: LAW_DESCRIPTION
columns.description: Description of the law dictionary where the cited violation came from. Blank fields represent errors in the database

columns.name: SUMMONS_CATEGORY_TYPE
columns.description: General description of the violation category

columns.name: AGE_GROUP
columns.description: Perpetrator’s age within a category

columns.name: SEX
columns.description: Perpetrator’s sex code. M(Male), F(Female), U(Unknown or violation issued to a business)

columns.name: RACE
columns.description: Perpetrator’s race description. U(Unknown or violation issued to a business)

columns.name: JURISDICTION_CODE
columns.description: Jurisdiction responsible for the issued violation. Jurisdiction codes 0(Patrol), 1(Transit) and 2(Housing) represent NYPD whilst codes 3 or more represent non NYPD jurisdictions

columns.name: BORO
columns.description: New York City Boroughs

columns.name: PRECINCT_OF_OCCUR
columns.description: Precinct where the violation was issued

columns.name: X_COORDINATE_CD
columns.description: Midblock X-coordinate for New York State Plane Coordinate System, Long Island Zone, NAD 83, units feet (FIPS 3104)

columns.name: Y_COORDINATE_CD
columns.description: Midblock Y-coordinate for New York State Plane Coordinate System, Long Island Zone, NAD 83, units feet (FIPS 3104)

columns.name: Latitude
columns.description: Latitude coordinate for Global Coordinate System, WGS 1984, decimal degrees (EPSG 4326)

columns.name: Longitude
columns.description: Longitude coordinate for Global Coordinate System, WGS 1984, decimal degrees (EPSG 4326)

columns.name: Lon_Lat
columns.description: Longitude and Latitude coordinates for mapping

fields.name: Agency

view.description:
List of every criminal summons issued in NYC going back to 2006 through the end of the previous calendar year.

This is a breakdown of every criminal summons issued in NYC by the NYPD going back to 2006 through the end of the previous calendar year.
This data is manually extracted every quarter and reviewed by the Office of Management Analysis and Planning before being posted on the NYPD website. Each record represents a criminal summons issued in NYC by the NYPD and includes information about the type of crime, the location and time of enforcement. In addition, information related to suspect demographics is also included.
This data can be used by the public to explore the nature of police enforcement activity.
Please refer to the attached data footnotes for additional information about this dataset.
view.emailShareUrl: mailto:?subject=NYPD Criminal Court Summons (Historic)&body=Here is a dataset from NYC Open Data that I would like to share with you: https%3A%2F%2Fdata.cityofnewyork.us%2FPublic-Safety%2FNYPD-Criminal-Court-Summons-Historic-%2Fsv2w-rv3k

Each record represents a criminal summons issued in NYC by the NYPD and includes information about the type of crime, the location and time of enforcement. In addition, information related to suspect demographics is also included.

Please refer to the attached data footnotes for additional information about this dataset.

relatedViews.name: NYPD Historic Criminal Summons - Summary Dashboard
relatedViews.description: The following visualizations summarize every criminal summons issued in NYC by the NYPD going back to 2006 through the end of last year.  This data is updated annually to include the most recent year. Each record represents a criminal summons issued in NYC by the NYPD and includes information about the type of infraction, the location and time of enforcement. In addition, information related to suspect demographics is also included. This data can be used by the public to explore the nature of police enforcement activity.
